verses.verse: In the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> after the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had gone <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> on that same <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>

When they had <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H7508>Rephidim,<s%> and had <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> they <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and there <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>encamped<s%> before the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to him out of the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "This is what you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>
<S%H7200><s%> 'You have seen what I <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and how I <S%H5375>bore<s%> you on <S%H5404>eagles<s%>' <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and brought you to <S%H935>myself.<s%>

Now <S%H8085>therefore,<s%> if you will indeed <S%H8085>obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> then you shall be my own <S%H5459>possession<s%> from among all <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> for all the earth is <S%H776>mine;<s%>

and you shall be to me a <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>' These are the <S%H1697>words<s%> which you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and set before them all these <S%H1697>words<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> commanded <S%H6680>him.<s%>

All the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "All that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H559>spoken<s%> we will <S%H6213>do.<s%>" <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>reported<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H935>"Behold,<s%> I come to you in a <S%H5645>thick<s%> <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H8085>hear<s%> when I <S%H1696>speak<s%> with <S%H539>you,<s%> and may also believe you <S%H5769>forever.<s%>" <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them <S%H3117>today<s%> and <S%H4279>tomorrow,<s%> and let them <S%H3526>wash<s%> their <S%H8071>garments,<s%>

and be <S%H3559>ready<s%> against the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> for on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will come <S%H3381>down<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>

You shall set <S%H1379>bounds<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8104><s%> 'Be careful that you <S%H5927>don't<s%> go up onto the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> or <S%H5060>touch<s%> its <S%H7097>border.<s%> Whoever <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> shall be <S%H4191>surely<s%> put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

No <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H5619>him,<s%> but he shall surely be <S%H5619>stoned<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3384>shot<s%> <S%H3384>through;<s%> whether it is <S%H929>animal<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> he shall not <S%H2421>live.<s%>' When the <S%H3104>trumpet<s%> sounds <S%H4900>long,<s%> they shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and they <S%H3526>washed<s%> their <S%H8071>clothes.<s%>
He <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H1961>"Be<s%> <S%H3559>ready<s%> by the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> <S%H5066>Don't<s%> have sexual relations with a <S%H802>woman.<s%>"

It happened on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> when it was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> that there were <S%H6963>thunders<s%> and <S%H1300>lightnings,<s%> and a <S%H3515>thick<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of an <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H2389>loud<s%> <S%H7782>trumpet;<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H2729>trembled.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> led the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H430>God;<s%> and they <S%H3320>stood<s%> at the <S%H8482>lower<s%> part of the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

<S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> all <S%H6225>it,<s%> smoked, <S%H6440>because<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%> on it in <S%H784>fire;<s%> and its <S%H6227>smoke<s%> <S%H5927>ascended<s%> like the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> of a <S%H3536>furnace,<s%> and the whole <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H2729>quaked<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%>

When the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H6963>grew<s%> <S%H1980>louder<s%> <S%H3966>and<s%> <S%H2390>louder,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him by a <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H413>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Go <S%H3381>down,<s%> <S%H5749>warn<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> lest they break <S%H2040>through<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H7200>gaze,<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> of them <S%H5307>perish.<s%>
Let the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5066>also,<s%> who come near to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H3068>themselves,<s%> lest Yahweh break forth on <S%H6555>them.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3201>can't<s%> come <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> for you <S%H5749>warned<s%> <S%H559>us,<s%> saying, <S%H1379><s%> 'Set bounds around the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and sanctify <S%H6942>it.<s%>'"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>him,<s%> "Go <S%H3381>down<s%> and you shall bring <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5927>up<s%> with <S%H3548>you,<s%> but don't let the priests and the <S%H5971>people<s%> break <S%H2040>through<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> lest he break forth on <S%H6555>them.<s%>"
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and told <S%H559>them.<s%>
